Protocols/GraphNode.html#/s:5AStar9Graph.name: Node
Protocols/GraphNode.html#/s:5AStar9Graph.abstract: In a GraphNode Graph the nodes are of type GraphNode.

Protocols/GraphNode.html#/s:5AStar9Graph.name: connectedNodes
Protocols/GraphNode.html#/s:5AStar9Graph.abstract: List of other graph nodes that this node has an edge leading to.

Protocols/GraphNode.html#/s:5AStar9Graph.name: estimatedCost(to:)
Protocols/GraphNode.html#/s:5AStar9Graph.abstract: Returns the estimated/heuristic cost to reach the indicated node from this node

Protocols/GraphNode.html#/s:5AStar9Graph.name: findPath(to:)
Protocols/GraphNode.html#/s:5AStar9Graph.abstract: Attempts to find the optimal path between this node and the indicated goal node.

Protocols/GraphNode.html#/s:5AStar9Graph.name: findPath(from:)
Protocols/GraphNode.html#/s:5AStar9Graph.abstract: As with findPathToNode: except this node is the goal node and a startNode is specified

Protocols/Graph.html#/s:5AStar5GraphP4No.name: Node
Protocols/Graph.html#/s:5AStar5GraphP4No.abstract: The type for the nodes or points in the graph

Protocols/Graph.html#/s:5AStar5GraphP13n.name: nodesAdjacent(to:)
Protocols/Graph.html#/s:5AStar5GraphP13n.abstract: The endpoints of all edges that start from a certain reference node

Protocols/Graph.html#/s:5AStar5GraphP13e.name: estimatedCost(from:to:)
Protocols/Graph.html#/s:5AStar5GraphP13e.abstract: The estimated/heuristic cost to reach the indicated end node from a given start node

Protocols/Graph.html#/s:5AStar5GraphP4co.name: cost(from:to:)
Protocols/Graph.html#/s:5AStar5GraphP4co.abstract: The actual cost to reach the indicated end node from a given start node

Protocols/Graph.html#/s:5AStar5GraphPAAE.name: findPath(from:to:)
Protocols/Graph.html#/s:5AStar5GraphPAAE.abstract: Attempts to find the optimal path from a reference node to the indicated goal node.

Protocols/Graph.html.name: Graph
Protocols/Graph.html.abstract: This protocol declares the requirements for optimal pathfinding in a directed graph of nodes and implements the A* algorithm via an extension.

Protocols/GraphNode.html.name: GraphNode
Protocols/GraphNode.html.abstract: A simplified version of the Graph protocol that allows optimal path finding between nodes without the need of a containing Graph type.
